entries.name: RFC822_DAYS
entries.desc: Abbreviated day-of-week names specified by RFC 822

entries.name: RFC822_MONTHS
entries.desc: Abbreviated month names specified by RFC 822

entries.name: TABLE_FOR_ESCAPE_HTML__
entries.desc: The set of special characters and their escaped values

entries.name: escapeElement(string, *elements)
entries.desc: Escape only the tags of certain HTML elements in string.

entries.name: escapeHTML(string)
entries.desc: Escape special characters in HTML, namely '&"<>

entries.name: rfc1123_date(time)
entries.desc: Format a Time object as a String using the format specified by RFC 1123.

entries.name: unescapeElement(string, *elements)
entries.desc: Undo escaping such as that done by #escapeElement

entries.name: unescapeHTML(string)
entries.desc: Unescape a string that has been HTML-escaped
